root.name: Not Tetris 2
root.description: OverviewNot Tetris 2 is a take on the Game Boy version of Tetris; it differs from the Game Boy version of Tetris by featuring a physics engine.The original version of Not Tetris did not have a line clear mechanic, and is included as a mode called "Stack" within Not Tetris 2. Line clears in Not Tetris 2 are based on horizontal block density instead of explicitly filling in an entire row with blocks as in classic Tetris.
